AT.name: Parascientific Escape Crossing at the Farthest Horizon
AT.description: The fusion of puzzle solving escape game and command selection adventure game - Parascientific Escape series Vol.3 - is here! Choose from the two previous protagonists: Kyosuke Ayana and Hitomi Akeneno, proceed with the separated stories on the stage of Latoua City, escape from three prisoned rooms! Months after the luxury cruise ship explosion case, the girl with two psychic powers, Hitomi Akeneno, has engaged in saving people with the psychic research facility, ZENA, is struggling to strengthen her abilities. At the same time, the detective with an artificial arm that has the ability to change the past time, Kyosuke Ayana, has just received the information that, Ritsu Kamiji, the person concerned with the serial killer case in Camellia Hills, would probably make some trouble in the small country of Eastern Europe, Witsarock. To stop the potential disaster, he set out for Witsarock. Now, the time of crossing the two stories, has arrived.

AU.name: Parascientific Escape Crossing at the Farthest Horizon
AU.description: The fusion of puzzle solving escape game and command selection adventure game - Parascientific Escape series Vol.3 - is here! To stop the potential disaster, he set out for Witsarock. Now, the time of crossing the two stories, has arrived.

BE.name: Parascientific Escape Crossing at the Farthest Horizon
BE.description: La fusion entre le jeu d'évasion et le jeu d’aventure textuel - Parascientific Escape series Vol.3 - est là! Choisissez parmi les deux protagonistes précédents: Kyosuke Ayana et Hitomi Akeneno, poursuivez les différentes histoires dans la ville de Latoua, échappez-vous de 3 prisons ! Des mois après le cas de l'explosion du bateau de luxe, la fille aux deux puissances psychiques, Hitomi Akeneno, s'est engagée à sauver les gens avec le centre de recherche psychique, ZENA, et se démène pour renforcer ses capacités. Dans le même temps, le détective avec un bras artificiel qui a la capacité de changer le passé, Kyosuke Ayana, vient de recevoir l'information selon laquelle, Ritsu Kamiji, la personne concernée dans l'affaire du tueur en série à Camellia Hills, poserait probablement quelques problèmes dans le petit pays d'Europe de l'Est, Witsarock. Pour éviter une catastrophe potentielle, il part pour Witsarock. Maintenant, le moment de croiser les deux histoires est arrivé.

SI.name: Parascientific Escape Crossing at the Farthest Horizon
SI.description: The fusion of puzzle solving escape game and command selection adventure game - Parascientific Escape series Vol.3 - is here! Choose from the two previous protagonists: Kyosuke Ayana and Hitomi Akeneno, proceed with the separated stories on the stage of Latoua City, escape from three prisoned rooms! Months after the luxury cruise ship explosion case, the girl with two psychic powers, Hitomi Akeneno, has engaged in saving people with the psychic research facility, ZENA, is struggling to strengthen her abilities. At the same time, the detective with an artificial arm that has the ability to change the past time, Kyosuke Ayana, has just received the information that, Ritsu Kamiji, the person concerned with the serial killer case in Camellia Hills, would probably make some trouble in the small country of Eastern Europe, Witsarock. To stop the potential disaster, he set out for Witsarock. Now, the time of crossing the two stories, has arrived.
